trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個自動化對等相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 與保存 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯的自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Group" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項模式的值列舉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 值，則為支援控制項模式的物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Hides all controls that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 中的所有控制項。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Shows the controls that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之控制項的狀態 (展開或摺疊)。

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> into the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup" /> 捲動到容器的可見區域。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGroupDataAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
